stimulusHtml: The graph shows the angular momentum L of a rigid system as a function of time t. Which of the following statements about the torque exerted on the system is supported by the graph?
choicesHtml: The torque decreases in magnitude and is in the same direction as the angular momentum.
The torque decreases in magnitude and is in the opposite direction of the angular momentum.
The torque increases in magnitude and is in the same direction as the angular momentum.
The torque increases in magnitude and is in the opposite direction of the angular momentum.
